name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in developing high-performance applications, particularly in network systems software and virtualization. Proficient in **C/C++**, **Linux**, and **Python**, with a solid foundation in **Golang** for software development. Demonstrated experience with **Microservices**, **CI/CD**, and **Containers**, implementing robust solutions utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code.
Skilled in cloud deployment strategies on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, fostering scalable solutions in diverse environments. Adept at debugging software to ensure reliability and compliance within various standards. Strong contributor to **network functions virtualization (NFV)** and leveraging advanced technologies to enhance performance. Additionally, experienced in frontend and backend development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, complemented by a proven track record in AI/ML platforms and predictive analytics.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained software solutions utilizing **C/C++** and **Golang** for efficient performance and high scalability in network systems software.
- Leveraged **Python** to implement strong back-end functionalities, contributing to microservices architectures and ensuring seamless integration with cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**.
- Designed and built robust CI/CD pipelines using **Terraform** and other modern tools, ensuring efficient software deployment and automated testing processes across multiple environments.
- Enhanced system performance on **Linux** platforms with in-depth debugging and optimization of applications, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
- Implemented containerization strategies leveraging **Docker** to support microservices in a dynamic and scalable environment.
- Contributed to NFV (Network Functions Virtualization) solutions to enhance system flexibility and support diverse workloads effectively.
- Utilized **DPDK** for high-speed packet processing applications, optimizing network throughput in critical systems.
- Championed the transformation of legacy applications into microservices, focusing on reducing deployment times from **weeks to days**.
- Ensured high availability and fault tolerance in deployments through effective use of **CI/CD** methodologies, decreasing release cycle times by up to **30%**.
- Collaborated on projects utilizing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to build and maintain distributed systems with a focus on reliability and performance efficiency.
- Notable involvement in the design and implementation of software debugging processes that resulted in a **25% reduction** in bug reports post-release.
- Engaged with cross-functional teams to align network system software requirements with business strategies, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.

Utilized **Python**, **Golang**, and **C/C++** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to a microservices architecture, successfully enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems by **30%**.
Implemented containerization using **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes** to streamline application deployment and management, achieving a deployment frequency increase of **40%**.
Designed and deployed CI/CD pipelines using **Terraform** and **AWS** services, reducing deployment times from **5 hours** to under **1 hour**.
Developed and maintained network systems software on **Linux** and **DPDK**, optimizing data packet processing efficiency, leading to a throughput increase of **25%**.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, utilizing **TypeScript** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and implemented a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Developed robust backend components for high-performance applications, utilizing **Python** and integrating with **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** cloud services to ensure scalability and reliability in complex environments.
Engineered microservices architectures employing **C/C++** and **Golang**, effectively handling up to **500K** concurrent connections while maintaining system efficiency.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Terraform** and containerization technologies, facilitating seamless deployment and scaling of applications across distributed systems with **minimum downtime**.
Designed and maintained network systems software to enhance performance, reducing latency by **30%** across service endpoints, achieving exceptional throughput for data processing.
Leveraged **Linux** and virtualization techniques to optimize resource allocation and achieve a **99.9%** uptime rate for critical applications.
Performed software debugging on multi-threaded applications to elevate reliability and maintainability by reducing defects by approximately **40%**.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, providing input for cross-functional teams, and ensuring optimal integration of software components with existing network systems.
Developed and optimized data structures and algorithms for efficient data management across high-demand services, improving data retrieval times by **25%**.
Applied the principles of NFV to enhance the flexibility of software deployment, significantly reducing the onboarding time for new services.
Fostered a culture of knowledge sharing, conducting code reviews and mentoring less experienced team members to maintain high standards of software quality.
